input.text: Hi. Spiky here. In this video, I'm going to show you how to install the ultra secure Qubes Operating System into a ProxMox Virtual Machine. Keep in mind that by doing so, we can not use this Qube in a Production Environment. We rendered the Qube useless when virtualizing it. This installation is pure for testing purposes. Let's go! A quick note. You can follow all steps in this video tutorial, at my Github page.
